name: Yangyang
description: Yangyang is an Outrider of the Midnight Rangers. Once sheltered, now a fighter. She soars with the wind to protect others, like a skylark in flight.

details.Basic Attack: Yangyang performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consumes Stamina to lunge forward, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Zephyr Song: After Heavy Attack or Dodge Counter, use a Basic Attack to cast Heavy Attack Monsoon to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consumes Stamina to perform a Plunging Attack from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to thrust forward, dealing Aero DMG.

details.Skill: Yangyang wields her sword to create a whirling vortex of winds that gathers nearby enemies to the center, dealing Aero DMG.

details.Liberation: Conjures a mighty cyclone that gathers nearby enemies, dealing Aero DMG.

details.Heavy Attack: Stormy Strike: When Yangyang has 3 Melodies, she can cast Stormy Strike after Heavy Attack, dealing Aero DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Feather Release: At 3 Melodies, casting Basic Attacks in mid-air consumes all Melodies to perform consecutive strikes and dive from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG. Upon landing, she sheathes her sword with an attack (considered Basic Attack).
details.Melody: Yangyang can hold up to 3 Melodies. Gains 1 Melody with every Basic Attack IV on hit; 1 Melody for every Zephyr Song on hit; 1 Melody when Resonance Skill Zephyr Domain hits; and 1 Melody upon casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.

inherent_skill1.name: Compassion
inherent_skill1.description: Recovers 30 Stamina after casting Mid-air Attack Feather Release.

inherent_skill2.name: Lazuline Mercy
inherent_skill2.description: Yangyang's Aero DMG Bonus is increased by 8% for 8s after casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.

intro_skill.name: Cerulean Song
intro_skill.description: Sends the target into the air, dealing Aero DMG.

outro_skill.name: Whispering Breeze
outro_skill.description: Recovers 4 Resonance Energy per second for 5s for the next character (or nearby team that activates an Outro Skill).

resonance_chain.s1: Intro Skill Cerulean Song increases Yangyang's Aero DMG Bonus by an additional 15% for 8s.
resonance_chain.s2: Heavy Attack restores an additional 10 Resonance Energy when it hits a target, once every 20s.
resonance_chain.s3: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by 40%. The Wind Field’s pulling effect on surrounding targets is enhanced, and pulling range is expanded by 33%.
resonance_chain.s4: Mid-air Attack Feather Release DMG is increased by 95%.
resonance_chain.s5: Resonance Liberation Wind Spirals DMG is increased by 85%.
resonance_chain.s6: After casting Mid-air Attack Feather Release, all team members’ ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.
